name: The Halloween Killings
description:
Follow a thrilling detective story set in an alternate universe in which the killers you know and love are actually just normal people going by their lives.

Take the shoes of a hardboiled detective that’s running from the mistakes of his past and drowning himself in whiskey cigars and….lasagna?

Tutorial
Choose the numbers 1-4 to build on the incriminating sentences to form a case against the killers
Press 'space' to advance the slides

NOTE THAT THE GAME WILL HAVE TO LOAD FOR LIKE 2 MINUTES ON SLOWER PCS.
